Eric Schmidt insisted that the move was part of a`` streamlining'' effort rather than a management shake up. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, he said.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.''
